Description: Worked flint blade, rectangular in shape, quite flat, segmented blade, truncated at proximal end, broken at distal; dorsal right lateral is backed, left lateral has abrupt retouch. Dull brownish cortex covers most of dorsal surface. Brownish-orange coloured stone, medium-grained.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, surface (X)
